SELECT r.id AS "id",r.org_name AS "orgName",r.advisor_name AS "advisorName", r.product_name AS "productName",date_format(re.issue_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS "issueTime",date_format(re.handle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS "handleTime", date_format(r.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS "commentTime",re.is_comment AS "isComment",re.org_telephone as "orgTelephone" FROM tb_service_rating r LEFT JOIN tb_service_require re ON r.require_id = re.id left join tb_service_org o on r.org_id_ = o.org_id_ where r.record_status = '1'
and re.issue_account = #{issueAccount}
and ( r.advisor_account = #{account} or o.org_account = #{account} )
and r.product_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchCode}, '%')
and re.advisor_name like CONCAT('%', #{advisorName}, '%')

select re.id as "id", re.req_num as "reqNum", date_format(re.issue_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as "issueTime", re.contract_amount as "contractAmount", re.req_name as "reqName",re.req_phone as "reqPhone", re.req_email as "reqEmail",re.req_detail as "reqDetail", re.contract_amount as "financingAmount", re.actual_loan_amount as "actualLoanAmount", re.financing_period_max as "financingPeriod", re.expected_date as "expectedDate", re.result_detail as "resultDetail", re.is_comment as "isComment", re.funds_req_desc as "fundsReqDesc" info.con_name as "conName",info.con_phone as "conPhone", info.con_email as "conEmail",re.org_name as "orgName", re.advisor_name as "advisorName", re.product_name as "productName", ra.attitude_score as "attitudeScore", ra.evaluation_desc as "evaluationDesc" from tb_service_require re left join tb_service_org_info info on re.org_id_ = info.org_id_ left join tb_service_rating ra on ra.require_id = re.id where re.record_status = '1' and re.id = #{id};
